food.name: Waffles
food.description: Two of our famous Waffles with plenty of real maple syrup.

food.name: Strawberry Milkshake
food.description: Strawberry milkashake with cream and chocolate.

food.name: French Toast
food.description: Thick slices made from our homemade sourdough bread

food.name: Homestyle Breakfast
food.description: Two eggs, bacon or sausage, toast, and our ever-popular hash browns.

food.name: Print Roasted stone fruit
food.description: Made with mighty oats and beautifully sweet dates.

food.name: Toasted Popeye bread
food.description: It’s super-high in vitamin K, which we need to keep our bones strong and healthy.

food.name: Print Classic crumpets
food.description: These require a little patience, but you just cannot beat a homemade crumpet.

food.name: Gallo pinto
food.description: Like a veggie kedgeree, this Costa Rican-inspired dish is great for breakfast.

food.name: Oaty fruity cereal
food.description: Contains dried fruit,mixed unsalted nuts, mixed seeds, porridge oats, ground cinnamon. Optional serving with milk or natural yoghur.

food.name: Simple cheese omelette
food.description: Served with wholemeal bread and a simple tomato salad for a healthy, balanced meal.
